title: Hour 2: Trade Aftermath
description:
Dan Orlovsky, Harry Douglas, and Courtney Cronin react to the Browns trading Baker Mayfield to the Panthers. The crew debates if the Panther's WR core will be the best Baker has had. Courtney and Harry discuss if they would want to see Kevin Durant back on the Warriors. Stick around to hear Dan talk about about Derek Carr and if he is under more pressure than Aaron Rodgers after the Davante Adams trade. Brian Windhorst joins the show to discuss the Jazz trading Rudy Gobert to the Timberwolves.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: The Jazz trade Rudy Gobert to the Timberwolves
